text_block_list.name: TV Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's the last 200 meters! "Queen of<n>the Amazons" Hishi
Amazon is in hot<n>pursuit of the lead! Narita Brian's<n>
struggling in the final straight!
Like the autumn Tenno Sho, the<n>Japan Cup was a bust...

Brian's winning streak felt like it<n>could have gone on
forever... I wonder<n>what happened as I watch videos of<n>
the races to find a clue.

Following the agenda, the next race'll<n>be the Arima Kinen.
There must be a<n>hint somewhere to getting her<n>previous
strength back.

text_block_list.name: TV Caster
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon finishes in a close<n>second! Narita Brian's
fallen behind<n>and finishes sixth!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
She's not drawing out all her energy.<n>And the low center of
gravity her form<n>used to have is—

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
She's not drawing out all her energy.<n>And the low center of
gravity her form<n>used to have is—
Knock, knock!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry to barge in.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Oh, a visit from you is rare.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Oh, a visit from you is rare.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes, well, you're looking after my<n>sister, and I want to
speak to you<n>about her.

Though she sounds relaxed, there's<n>concern in her
expression. She must<n>be more worried about Brian than<n>
anyone.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Rumor has it that her injury hasn't<n>fully healed yet...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
That's just a rumor. All you have to<n>do is watch her run to
see that she's<n>recovered.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
As I suspected. I can't imagine you<n>would let her overexert
herself, but<n>her results aren't improving.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Faced by that fact, do you still intend<n>for her to run in the
Arima Kinen?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
As long as Brian wants to run, I'm<n>going to respect her
wishes.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Even though you don't know what's<n>causing the problem?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
If she were to lose again in the Arima<n>Kinen, your guidance
could be called<n>into question. You'll have her run<n>knowing
that?
That's definitely a real possibility. But<n>I don't care.
choice_data_list: I will always put what Brian wants above all else.
I will always put what Brian wants above all else.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Heheh... Good, that's a relief to hear.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, I came here to request<n>that she run in the
Arima Kinen.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You did?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But I see that wasn't necessary. You<n>have what's best for
your racers—for<n>Brian—in mind.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'd like to say one thing though. It's<n>about the time she lost
the autumn<n>Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I was surprised too when she placed<n>twelfth. Afterward I
went to see her,<n>and...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: ...She was crying?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
We're sisters, but I don't remember<n>the last time I saw
tears streaming<n>down her face.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Racing isn't something she'd ever<n>quit easily.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: So I hope you do everything you can<n>to help her... Please.

Hayahide may already understand<n>what's happened to
Brian.

Deep in her eyes, I see a sister's<n>love. It's clear she's
putting a lot of<n>faith in me to help her younger sibling.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: It's after hours, Brian. The track's<n>closed.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: It's after hours, Brian. The track's<n>closed.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
The Arima Kinen's almost here, so<n>just give it to me
straight.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Are you here... to tell me to stop<n>training?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: No, I came to see how you're doing.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: No, I came to see how you're doing.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: How I'm doing?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I heard from Hayahide about what<n>happened after the
autumn Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I don't know enough to understand<n>why you were crying...
yet.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I don't know enough to understand<n>why you were crying...
yet.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: But I do know that race was a big<n>deal for you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: But I do know that race was a big<n>deal for you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I see. So you came to check up on<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
What now? Are you going to tell me<n>to call off the Arima
Kinen?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Crying just because I lost a race...<n>You think such a pitiful
excuse of a<n>racer has no right entering the Grand<n>Prix,
don't you?!

Brian glares at me with piercing eyes,<n>almost growling out
the words.
When I see that glimmer in her gaze, I<n>become sure of it.
choice_data_list: No, you're running in the Arima Kinen.
No, you're running in the Arima Kinen.

text_block_list.text: When I see that glimmer in her gaze, I<n>become sure of it.
choice_data_list: No, you're running in the Arima Kinen.
No, you're running in the Arima Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...I am?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I think... I'm starting to understand the<n>reason for your
tears. Your will can't<n>be bent.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I think... I'm starting to understand the<n>reason for your
tears. Your will can't<n>be bent.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
So I'm going to let you run wild. A<n>trainer's there to support
their racers.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
So I'm going to let you run wild. A<n>trainer's there to support
their racers.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...I see.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I shouldn't have doubted you.<n>Um... thank you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Right, time to pull out all the stops!

I don't know why Brian can't get<n>back to normal, and I
don't know<n>what brought her to tears either.

But even so, I believe in her. Because<n>in that look of hers, I
see only<n>determination.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian holds an ideal spot as<n>she enters the final
straight! Will this<n>finally be her day?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That's impeccable positioning! All<n>that's left is to charge
ahead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
In the lead is the winner of the Kikuka<n>Sho, Mayano Top
Gun! Narita Brian's<n>fiercely chasing behind!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Go, Brian! Give us that good ol' sprint<n>we know and love!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
But it looks like she's struggling!<n>Where's that raw power
Brian is<n>famous for?

Brian runs past our section of the<n>stands, and her
expression comes<n>into clear view.

She's running as if clawing at the<n>ground in pure
desperation.

But she's unable to reach even the<n>shadow of Mayano Top
Gun, and her<n>other opponents soon catch up from<n>behind.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: It's no use, she won't make it!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: The Brian we knew is no longer...

Her gaze never falters though. She<n>hungers for victory,
never losing sight<n>of the finish line.
As I watch her frantic attempt, I finally<n>understand.

Her losing streak isn't because of<n>"lingering pain" or "poor
training." It's<n>because her old running style isn't<n>working
for her anymore.

She must've realized this during the<n>autumn Tenno Sho...
and the<n>hopelessness of it brought her to<n>tears.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian can't shorten the gap!<n>Mayano Top Gun is
unchallenged!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!
But she continues on—she always<n>pushes forward.
All the pieces click into place in my<n>mind, and I shout—

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: ...C'mon, Briaaan!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Keep going, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And Mayano Top Gun wins the race!<n>With the momentum
from her Kikuka<n>Sho victory, she's won the Arima<n>Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Narita Brian can't hold out and<n>finishes fourth!

I used to praise her boundless<n>strength, but this might be
the first<n>time I shouted to encourage her.

Though the result isn't what we<n>hoped for, I feel like we've
made<n>progress—her as a runner, and me as<n>her trainer.

She'll never stop running toward<n>victory. That's what
makes her the<n>best.
